Product Description

IGAN 6-inch Wire Cutters. One of the Strongest Lightweight Cutters

IGAN-P6

IGAN was originally founded in 2002 with an independent team of laboratory engineers. Specializing in the development and design of accessories for hand tools, automotive supplies, sports facilities, and fishing industries.

Product Features Flush and Clean Cut 13/16” Cutting Edge High Hardness CR-V Steel Labor-saving Handle, Spring-loaded Non-slip Matte Handle

Ultra Sharp, Powerful, Widely Used

13/16” Extra-Long Cutting Edge, will meet most of your cutting needs. Can easily snips soft wire up to 12 AWG.

Professional Flush Cut

Use the IGAN-P6 wire cutter to create precise flush cutting! Improved blades provide a superior shearing action with a smooth, flat and clean cut.

Durable & Reliable Tools

Forged from high-hardness Chrome Vanadium Tool Steel, heat-treated and precision ground angled head. One of the strongest 6-inch wire clippers.

Do The Job Right

Ideal Wire Cutters for Crafts, Floral wire, Electrical wire, Cable Ties, Plastic, Jewelry making, Household, etc.

Labor-saving Tools

Perfect length to provide great leverage with a spring-loaded mechanism to minimize hand fatigue.

Cutting Capacity

Soft wire 12 AWG, Iron wire 12AWG(Φ2.0mm), Plastic Φ3.0mm, not for use on Steel Wire.If any IGAN P6 Flush Cutter ever fails for any reason, simply email or reply to IGAN and IGAN will ship a replacement.

Size
6-inch 6-inch 6-inch

Cutting Capacity
12 AWG 12 AWG 12 AWG

Size

✓

1.Ultra-Sharp Wire Cutters: 13/16” extra-long cutting edge can easily snips electrical wire up to 12 AWG.
2.Specialized Flush Cut: Improved blades design provide a smooth, flat and clean cut. Ideal wire cutters for Crafting, Floral wire, Electrical wire, Artificial flowers, Cable Ties, Plastic, Edge banding, etc.
3.High Hardness CR-V: Forged from chrome vanadium tool steel, heat-treated and precision ground angled head. One of the strongest 6-inch wire clippers.
4.Labor-saving Tools: Perfect length to provide great leverage with a spring-loaded mechanism to minimize hand fatigue.
5.Full lifetime warranty: If any IGAN P6 Flush Cutter ever fails for any reason, simply email or reply to the IGAN customer service and IGAN will ship a replacement.

Product Description

This garden tool kit will do almost all your gardening work while giving you the best gardening experience.

Designed for gardening lovers, create your dream garden with pro tools.When you have this gardening tool set, please take care of it.Please wash and dry the tool after use for storage and avoid long time exposure to sunlight.All accessories in the gardening set are made of high quality materials and quality is our main concern.

Garden Tool Organizer

Made of 600D oxford cloth, it is easy to clean.Very spacious, with 8 pockets in total, it can organize all gardening tools perfectly and easy to carry.

Gardening Gloves

Pure cotton material, printed design, comfortable to wear, breathable.Palm anti-slip design, very good grip.

Cute Towel

Highly absorbent and easy to clean.Dry them promptly when you are done gardening for a longer life.

Gardening Knee Pad

High-density kneeling pad is comfortable and soft, effective protection of the knee, tired of sitting on it to rest.

Sprayer

To ensure your comfortable gardening experience, the spray bottle is made of high quality material that is hard and will not break or leak.Holds up to 20oz (600ml) of liquid.

Pruning Shears

Pruning shears with sharp blades, rust-proof design and safety lock.Can cut up to 3/4 inch branches.

Hand Rake

Hand rake is mainly used to loosen the soil to soil aeration, level the soil, clean leaves and debris.

Trowel

The trowel is mainly used for digging and transporting soil, but also for transplanting smaller plants or flowers without injuring the root system.

Hand Fork

The hand fork is suitable for loosening soil, weeding, aeration and cleaning up garbage, it can do a lot of gardening work.

Great Gift Ideas

When she thinks of you every time she uses this gardening kit, WANCHI will keep the memories for a long time!This gardening kit is suitable for gardening beginners and green thumbs to create a dream garden, perfect for Christmas, birthday, New Year, New Home，anniversary, Mother’s Day, Father’s Day as gifts for women, gifts for lady, gifts for mom, gifts for grandma, gifts for friends, gifts for neighbors, gifts for gardeners.

4 PCS 11 PCS 8 PCS 7 PCS 1 Pair

Suitable for Gifts

✓

✓

【Ergonomic Rubber Grip】The aluminum gardening tools have comfortable, non-slip rubber grips to reduce hand pain and fatigue.
【Weeder】Perfect design can save your time and effort in weeding work.
【Garden Tool Sets】This garden kit can meet your pruning, digging, weeding, loosening soil, watering, transplanting and all garden work.

item.content:encoded:
Price: $8.99 - $6.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:51:15 UTC – Details)



Excellent Shape and Size : A spot-on size is really important, our mouse pad measures approximately 9.4 x 8.3 inches(L X W), 0.9 inch thick. It fit for almose all kind of Mouses. You can move the mouse around easily and the pad shapes it well. Moreover, the reinforced edges can efficiently prevent deformation and damage to guarantee long time use.
Environmental Material : Made of soft smooth breathable material and non-deformable momory form, it is no-toxic, no any chemicals safe to use. More important, unlike other moused pads on the market, our mouse pads have no any bad smells!
Endless Comfortness : Applies non-slip PU rubber base, this mouse pad will firmly grasp your desk without any chance of sliding or unwanted movement for the mouse pad, so you can better focus your attention when working or studying.
Protects Your Wrists : With raised ergonomic soft memory form design, it will provide good touch and effective support to your wrist. Keep arms, wrists, and hands from getting sore while using the computer, maximum reduce wrist stress and tiredness.

Price: $8.99 - $6.99
